short.ar: بسهولة إدارة ملفات تعريف الارتباط والتخزين المحلي وتخزين الجلسة لعلامة التبويب المحددة.
short.am: ለተመረጠው ትር ኩኪዎችን, የአካባቢ ማከማቻ እና የክፍለ ጊዜ ማከማቻን በቀላሉ አስተዳድር።
short.bg: Управлявайте лесно бисквитки, локално съхранение и съхранение на сесии за избрания раздел.
short.bn: নির্বাচিত ট্যাবের জন্য সহজেই কুকিজ, স্থানীয় স্টোরেজ এবং সেশন স্টোরেজ পরিচালনা করুন।
short.ca: Gestiona fàcilment les galetes, l'emmagatzematge local i l'emmagatzematge de sessions per a la pestanya seleccionada.
short.cs: Snadná správa souborů cookie, místního úložiště a úložiště relací pro vybranou kartu.
short.da: Administrer nemt cookies, lokal lagring og sessionslagring for den valgte fane.
short.de: Cookies, lokalen Speicher und Sitzungsspeicher für die ausgewählte Registerkarte einfach verwalten.
short.el: Διαχειριστείτε εύκολα τα cookie, τον τοπικό χώρο αποθήκευσης και τον χώρο αποθήκευσης περιόδου λειτουργίας για την επιλεγμένη…
short.en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,pt_PT: Easily manage Cookies, Local Storage and Session Storage for the selected tab.
short.es: Gestione fácilmente las cookies, el almacenamiento local y el almacenamiento de sesiones para la pestaña seleccionada.
short.et: Hallake valitud vahekaardi küpsiseid, kohalikku salvestusruumi ja seansisalvestust hõlpsalt.
short.fa: کوکی‌ها، فضای ذخیره‌سازی محلی و ذخیره‌سازی جلسه را به راحتی برای برگه انتخاب شده مدیریت کنید.
short.fi: Hallitse valitun välilehden evästeitä, paikallista tallennustilaa ja istunnon tallennusta helposti.
short.fil: Madaling pamahalaan ang Cookies, Local Storage at Session Storage para sa napiling tab.
short.fr: Gérez facilement les cookies, le stockage local et le stockage de session pour l'onglet sélectionné.
short.gu: પસંદ કરેલ ટેબ માટે કૂકીઝ, લોકલ સ્ટોરેજ અને સેશન સ્ટોરેજ સરળતાથી મેનેજ કરો.
short.he: נהל בקלות קובצי Cookie, אחסון מקומי ואחסון הפעלה עבור הכרטיסייה שנבחרה.
short.hi: चयनित टैब के लिए कुकीज़, स्थानीय भंडारण और सत्र भंडारण को आसानी से प्रबंधित करें।
short.hr: Jednostavno upravljajte kolačićima, lokalnom pohranom i pohranom sesije za odabranu karticu.
short.hu: Könnyen kezelheti a cookie-kat, a helyi tárolást és a munkamenet-tárolást a kiválasztott lapon.
short.id: Kelola Cookie, Penyimpanan Lokal, dan Penyimpanan Sesi dengan mudah untuk tab yang dipilih.
short.it: Gestisci facilmente i cookie, l'archiviazione locale e l'archiviazione della sessione per la scheda selezionata.
short.ja: 選択したタブの Cookie、ローカル ストレージ、セッション ストレージを簡単に管理します。
short.kn: ಆಯ್ದ ಟ್ಯಾಬ್‌ಗಾಗಿ ಕುಕೀಗಳು, ಸ್ಥಳೀಯ ಸಂಗ್ರಹಣೆ ಮತ್ತು ಸೆಷನ್ ಸಂಗ್ರಹಣೆಯನ್ನು ಸುಲಭವಾಗಿ ನಿರ್ವಹಿಸಿ.
short.ko: 선택한 탭에 대한 쿠키, 로컬 저장소 및 세션 저장소를 쉽게 관리합니다.
short.lt: Lengvai tvarkykite pasirinkto skirtuko slapukus, vietinę saugyklą ir seanso saugyklą
short.lv: Vienkārši pārvaldiet sīkfailus, vietējo krātuvi un sesijas krātuvi atlasītajai cilnei.
short.ml: തിരഞ്ഞെടുത്ത ടാബിനായി കുക്കികൾ, ലോക്കൽ സ്റ്റോറേജ്, സെഷൻ സ്റ്റോറേജ് എന്നിവ എളുപ്പത്തിൽ നിയന്ത്രിക്കുക.
short.mr: निवडलेल्या टॅबसाठी कुकीज, स्थानिक स्टोरेज आणि सेशन स्टोरेज सहज व्यवस्थापित करा.
short.ms: Uruskan Kuki, Storan Tempatan dan Storan Sesi dengan mudah untuk tab yang dipilih.
short.nl: Beheer eenvoudig cookies, lokale opslag en sessieopslag voor het geselecteerde tabblad.
short.no: Administrer enkelt informasjonskapsler, lokal lagring og øktlagring for den valgte fanen.
short.pl: Łatwo zarządzaj plikami cookie, lokalną pamięcią masową i pamięcią sesji dla wybranej karty.
short.pt_BR: Gerencie facilmente cookies, armazenamento local e armazenamento de sessão para a guia selecionada.
short.ro: Gestionați cu ușurință modulele cookie, stocarea locală și stocarea sesiunii pentru fila selectată.
short.ru: Легко управлять файлами cookie, локальным хранилищем и хранилищем сеансов для выбранной вкладки.
short.sk: Jednoducho spravujte súbory cookie, miestne úložisko a úložisko relácií pre vybratú kartu.
short.sl: Preprosto upravljanje piškotkov, lokalnega pomnilnika in shranjevanja sej za izbrani zavihek.
short.sr: Лако управљајте колачићима, локалним складиштем и складиштем сесија за изабрану картицу.
short.sv: Hantera enkelt cookies, lokal lagring och sessionslagring för den valda fliken.
short.sw: Dhibiti Vidakuzi, Hifadhi ya Ndani na Hifadhi ya Kipindi kwa kichupo kilichochaguliwa.
short.ta: தேர்ந்தெடுக்கப்பட்ட தாவலுக்கு குக்கீகள், உள்ளூர் சேமிப்பு மற்றும் அமர்வு சேமிப்பகத்தை எளிதாக நிர்வகிக்கவும்.
short.te: ఎంచుకున్న ట్యాబ్ కోసం కుక్కీలు, స్థానిక నిల్వ మరియు సెషన్ నిల్వను సులభంగా నిర్వహించండి.
short.th: จัดการคุกกี้ พื้นที่เก็บข้อมูลในเครื่อง และพื้นที่เก็บข้อมูลเซสชันสำหรับแท็บที่เลือกได้อย่างง่ายดาย
short.tr: Seçilen sekme için Çerezleri, Yerel Depolamayı ve Oturum Depolamayı kolayca yönetin.
short.uk: Легке керування файлами cookie, локальним сховищем і сховищем сеансів для вибраної вкладки.
short.vi: Dễ dàng quản lý Cookie, Bộ nhớ cục bộ và Bộ nhớ phiên cho tab đã chọn.
short.zh_CN: 轻松管理所选选项卡的 Cookie、本地存储和会话存储。
short.zh_TW: 輕鬆管理所選選項卡的 Cookie、本地存儲和會話存儲。

long.ar,da,el,fa,fr,hi,id,it,ja,ko,mr,ms,nl,n:
StorageAce provides ability to easily manage Cookies, Local Storage and Session Storage.

🅵🅴🅰🆃🆄🆁🅴🆂

❚█══ ℂ𝕠𝕠𝕜𝕚𝕖𝕤 ══█❚

★ Add Cookie
★ Import Cookies in JSON format
★ Edit Cookies using form
★ Edit Cookies using JSON Editor
★ Delete Cookies
★ Search Cookies by cookie name or cookie value
★ Sort Cookies by cookie domain, cookie name, cookie path and cookie value by clicking table column headers.
★ Protect Cookies (Set cookies as read-only)
★ Block cookies by domain, name and value filters
★ Export cookies in JSON, Netscape HTTP Cookie File, Semicolon separated name=value pairs, Perl::LWP formats. Also, you can export cookies in JSON format that can be imported by Puppeteer.
★ Backup Cookies
★ Select multiple Cookies and do actions like view, edit in JSON editor, delete, protect, unprotect, block, save etc.
★ Limit Max Age of Cookies.
★ Quick Filters available for filtering cookies in one click.

❚█══ 𝕃𝕠𝕔𝕒𝕝𝕤𝕥𝕠𝕣𝕒𝕘𝕖 ══█❚

★ Add item in local storage
★ Import items in local storage in JSON format
★ Edit item in local storage using form
★ Edit item in local storage using JSON Editor
★ Delete items in local storage
★ Search items in local storage by key or value
★ Sort items in local storage by key/value by clicking table column headers.
★ Export local storage items in JSON format
★ Select multiple items of local storage and do actions like view, edit in JSON editor, delete etc.

❚█══ 𝕊𝕖𝕤𝕤𝕚𝕠𝕟𝕤𝕥𝕠𝕣𝕒𝕘𝕖 ══█❚

★ Add item in session storage
★ Import items in session storage in JSON format
★ Edit item in session storage using form
★ Edit item in session storage using JSON Editor
★ Delete items in session storage
★ Search items in session storage by key or value
★ Sort items in session storage by key/value by clicking table column headers.
★ Export session storage items in JSON format
★ Select multiple items of session storage and do actions like view, edit in JSON editor, delete etc.

❚█══ 𝕆𝕥𝕙𝕖𝕣 𝔽𝕖𝕒𝕥𝕦𝕣𝕖𝕤 ══█❚

★ Right-click and select "StorageAce" via Context menu 
★ Incognito mode Supported and settings are synced in incognito and normal modes.
★ Beautified JSON View for storage items
★ Choose path for download.
★ Ability to Remember last download path.
★ Extra feature to allow copying JWT using "Copy JWT" button. It will copy the JWT in the selected storage type.
long.am,bg,bn,cs,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,:
StorageAce provides ability to easily manage Cookies, Local Storage and Session Storage.

🅵🅴🅰🆃🆄🆁🅴🆂

❚█══ ℂ𝕠𝕠𝕜𝕚𝕖𝕤 ══█❚

★ Add Cookie
★ Import Cookies in JSON format
★ Edit Cookies using form
★ Edit Cookies using JSON Editor
★ Delete Cookies
★ Search Cookies by cookie name or cookie value
★ Sort Cookies by cookie domain, cookie name, cookie path and cookie value by clicking table column headers.
★ Protect Cookies (Set cookies as read-only)
★ Block cookies by domain, name and value filters
★ Export cookies in JSON, Netscape HTTP Cookie File, Semicolon separated name=value pairs, Perl::LWP formats. Also, you can export cookies in JSON format that can be imported by Puppeteer.
★ Backup Cookies
★ Select multiple Cookies and do actions like view, edit in JSON editor, delete, protect, unprotect, block, save etc.
★ Limit Max Age of Cookies.
★ Quick Filters available for filtering cookies in one click.

❚█══ 𝕃𝕠𝕔𝕒𝕝𝕤𝕥𝕠𝕣𝕒𝕘𝕖 ══█❚

★ Add item in local storage
★ Import items in local storage in JSON format
★ Edit item in local storage using form
★ Edit item in local storage using JSON Editor
★ Delete items in local storage
★ Search items in local storage by key or value
★ Sort items in local storage by key/value by clicking table column headers.
★ Export local storage items in JSON format
★ Select multiple items of local storage and do actions like view, edit in JSON editor, delete etc.

❚█══ 𝕊𝕖𝕤𝕤𝕚𝕠𝕟𝕤𝕥𝕠𝕣𝕒𝕘𝕖 ══█❚

★ Add item in session storage
★ Import items in session storage in JSON format
★ Edit item in session storage using form
★ Edit item in session storage using JSON Editor
★ Delete items in session storage
★ Search items in session storage by key or value
★ Sort items in session storage by key/value by clicking table column headers.
★ Export session storage items in JSON format
★ Select multiple items of session storage and do actions like view, edit in JSON editor, delete etc.

❚█══ 𝕆𝕥𝕙𝕖𝕣 𝔽𝕖𝕒𝕥𝕦𝕣𝕖𝕤 ══█❚

★ Right-click and select "StorageAce" via Context menu 
★ Incognito mode Supported and settings are synced in incognito and normal modes.
★ Beautified JSON View for storage items
★ Choose path for download.
★ Ability to Remember last download path.
★ Extra feature to allow copying JWT using "Copy JWT" button. It will copy the JWT in the selected storage type.

❚█══ Privacy ══█❚
StorageAce respects your privacy and all your data is safe.

If browser syncing is enabled, then the settings of the extension is synced to any Chrome browser that the user is logged into.

All your localStorage, sessionStorage and cookies remains offline.
long.ca,es:
StorageAce provides user-friendly UI that helps the user to easily manage Cookies, Local Storage and Session Storage.

🅵🅴🅰🆃🆄🆁🅴🆂
☄️Manage different storage types - Cookies, Local storage and Session storage
☄️Add new storage items via
      ✦ Import JSON
      ✦ Add button
☄️Edit selected storage items via
      ✦ Inline Edit
      ✦ Edit using UI controls like textboxes, checkbox etc.
      ✦ Edit using custom Editor in JSON format
☄️Delete selected storage items
☄️Search storage item
☄️Sort storage items via table columns click.
☄️Import storage data in JSON.
☄️Protect cookies (non-editable)
☄️Export storage items via different formats:
      ✦ Local/session storage - JSON
      ✦ Cookies - 
               ⋆ JSON
               ⋆ Netscape HTTP Cookie File
               ⋆ Semicolon separated name=value pairs
               ⋆ Perl::LWP 
☄️Incognito mode Supported
☄️Beautified JSON View for storage items
☄️Choose path for download.
☄️Ability to Remember last download path.
☄️Extra feature to allow copying JWT using "Copy JWT" button.
